## ProgressWindowOptions.delayClosing property

Hide the window for a moment before closing. Window will pop up faster if a subsequent item is added before delay is finished. True/false or number of milliseconds. Defaults to true, which delays for 3000ms.

**Signature:**

```typescript
delayClosing?: boolean | number;
```
